faqs.q: How many calories are in a ny strip steak?
faqs.a: About 568 kcal for a standard 8 oz grilled NY strip steak.

faqs.q: How much protein is in one NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Roughly 61 g of protein in an 8 oz serving.

faqs.q: Is NY strip steak high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~34 g total fat per 8 oz, including 14 g saturated; choose leaner cuts to reduce.

faqs.q: What are the calories per 100 g of NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal per 100 g grilled, with 27 g protein and 15 g fat.
